reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was a really good choice for us. Its location is superb, something which is worth remembering in a city which is so large and busy. Everything is at your doorstep and when the heat gets too much, it is pleasant to return to your hotel at any time in the day to freshen up.
reviews.title: Excellent value hotel

reviews.text: A clean, well-maintained hotel with a helpful staff. Breakfast is good and varied, though it does pay not to arrive later, as the choice does dwindle.
reviews.title: Good price, good location, friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A good stay, in the heart of District 1 surrounded by excellent restaurants and posh, overpriced hotels.
reviews.title: Enjoyable Stay

reviews.text: We stayed in the Bong Sen Annexe for several nights. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful to us. The hotel is also in a very good location near to the Dong-Khoi Area. Our room was spacious and well-maintained and I felt that their rates were reasonable given their location. 45++, 55++ or 65++ if I recall for economy, economy with a view and presumably a superior.
reviews.title: Only ok
value for a central hotel
reviews.text: The Bong Sen 2 [ annex] good value for a central location in district 1, very clean, and security is good. Has all the extras, a/c, mini bar, and a nice bathroom. I will stay there again, however we did stay across the road on the way back at the In- ochine hotel, we stayed in a delux room with a balcony for 30 usd a night, very good value considering some hotels just around the corner were charging 175.00 usd a night [The Sheraton]
